name: @noaignite/wordpress-rest-api
author: NoA Ignite
description: Api client and helpers for the WordPress REST api.

scripts.build: yarn build:types && yarn build:esm && yarn build:node && yarn build:copy-files
scripts.build:esm: cross-env NODE_ENV=production BABEL_ENV=esm babel src --config-file ../../babel.config.js --out-dir build --extensions ".ts,.tsx" --ignore "**/*.d.ts,**/*.types.ts"
scripts.build:node: cross-env NODE_ENV=production BABEL_ENV=node babel src --config-file ../../babel.config.js --out-dir build/node --extensions ".ts,.tsx" --ignore "**/*.d.ts,**/*.types.ts"
